issue.title: Deleting model with plugin crashes gzserver

content.raw:
I'm getting back to this issue and really need to find a fix since at the moment we have to restart Gazebo every time we want to start a new experiment with different models (which entails deleting the old models).  Here is the error I just go when trying to delete a model that includes the ray plugin:

gzserver: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo7-debbuilder/build/gazebo-7.14.0/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:551: void gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::RunLoop(): Assertion `(diffTime.sec < maxSensorUpdate)&&("Took over 1000*max_step_size to update a sensor.")' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo-3] process has died [pid 7212, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver -e ode /home/patrick/jr2_catkin_ws/src/jr2_testing/jr2_gazebo/worlds/gates_1_foyer_no_holes.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/patrick/.ros/log/5345fa70-d78f-11e8-86c8-509a4c47197c/gazebo-3.log].
log file: /home/patrick/.ros/log/5345fa70-d78f-11e8-86c8-509a4c47197c/gazebo-3*.log
